itemDescription: Scottish international lawn and indoor bowler

wikipedia_page.main: Kay Moran (born 5 October 1973) is a female Scottish international lawn and indoor bowler.

link_mentions.page: Lawn bowls at the 2006 Commonwealth Games

response: : Joyce Lindores & Kay Moran Women's Bowls Pairs

link_mentions.page: List of Commonwealth Games medallists in lawn bowls

response: In 2018 she was selected as part of the Scottish team for the 2018 Commonwealth Games on the Gold Coast in Queensland that won a silver medal in the Triples with Kay Moran and Stacey McDougall. In 2019 she won the triples silver medal and singles bronze medal at the Atlantic Bowls Championships.

link_mentions.page: 2008 World Outdoor Bowls Championship – Women's singles
2008 World Outdoor Bowls Championship – Women's pairs

response: She was selected as part of the Scottish team for the 2018 Commonwealth Games, on the Gold Coast in Queensland that won a silver medal in the Triples with Kay Moran and Caroline Brown.
